actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to provide for the designation on income tax forms of contributions to retire the public debt.

summary.text: Permits the designation on income tax returns of one dollar or more of any overpayment of income tax and any cash contributions which the taxpayer includes with such return for the reduction of the public debt. Requires the transfer of such amounts to a special account to be used to reduce the public debt.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the designation on income tax forms of contributions to retire the public debt.
